Text: I'm sorry but I'm very busy right now. Please come back later if you need to talk to me.
I'm sorry but I'm very busy right now. Please come back later if you need to talk to me.
Options: I hear you are looking for recruits.

Text: Yes I am. As you have no doubt heard, there has been an alarming number of monster sightings recently. The most recent report suggests someone was getting water from the well and a slime came up instead. I need you to go check that out for me.
